content:
A signing up thread is a good idea, and nice to know that you'll be on board! I've added your name to the list.

Everyone who has signed up: please feel free to ignore this thread by selecting "Mute the topic" in the drop-down menu.
Sign me up, please! I'm very excited about this.
Please sign me up, too. This looks great!
I just learned about this and it looks awesome! Sign me up if it's not too late
